Key.Original: The FN P90 is a personal defense weapon (PDW) designed and manufactured by FN Herstal in Belgium.
Key.English: The FN P90 is a personal defense weapon (PDW) designed and manufactured by FN Herstal in Belgium.
Key.Spanish: El FN P90 es un subfusil automático para defensa personal fabricado en Bélgica por FN Herstal (Fabrique Nationale de Herstal).
Key.Japanese: FN P90 は個人防衛火器で、ベルギーの FN ハースタルにより設計、製造される。

短機関銃
口径: 5.07x28 mm

Key.Original: The Heckler and Koch G36 is a 5.56×45mm assault rifle, designed in the early 1990s by Heckler and Koch (HK) as a replacement for the heavier 7.62mm G3 battle rifle.
Key.English: The Heckler and Koch G36 is a 5.56×45mm assault rifle, designed in the early 1990s by Heckler and Koch (HK) as a replacement for the heavier 7.62mm G3 battle rifle.
Key.Spanish: El Heckler and Koch G36 es un fusil de asalto del calibre 5,56 mm diseñado por Heckler and Koch durante los años noventa como sustituto del HK G3.
Key.Japanese: ヘッケラー アンド コッホ G36 は 5.56×45 mm 自動小銃で、1990 年初頭ヘッケラー アンド コッホにより 7.62mm G3 小銃を置き換えるため設計された。

Key.Original: The CETME assault rifle of the Spanish Army is developed by the Center for Technical Studies of Special Materials (Centro de Estudios Técnicos de Materiales Especiales) in Spain.
Key.English: The CETME assault rifle of the Spanish Army is developed by the Center for Technical Studies of Special Materials (Centro de Estudios Técnicos de Materiales Especiales) in Spain.
Key.Spanish: El CETME es el fusil de asalto del Ejército Español desarrollado en España por el Centro de Estudios Técnicos de Materiales Especiales.
Key.Japanese: スペイン陸軍のセトメ小銃はスペインの特殊素材技術研究センター (Centro de Estudios Técnicos de Materiales Especiales) により開発された。

Key.Portuguese:
Fuzil de atirador de elite
Calibre: 7.62x51 mm
Key.Japanese:
選抜射手小銃
口径: 7.62x51 mm

Key.Original: The Accuracy International Arctic Warfare rifle is a family of bolt-action sniper rifles designed and manufactured by the British company, Accuracy International. It has proved popular as a civilian, police and military rifle since its introduction.
Key.English: The Accuracy International Arctic Warfare rifle is a family of bolt-action sniper rifles designed and manufactured by the British company, Accuracy International. It has proved popular as a civilian, police and military rifle since its introduction.
Key.Spanish: El Accuracy International Arctic Warfare (AW) es una familia de fusiles de francotirador de cerrojo manual diseñada y fabricada por la compañía británica Accuracy International. Se ha hecho popular como fusil de caza, de policía y militar desde su introducción en los años ochenta.
Key.Japanese: アキュラシー インターナショナル アークティク ウォーフェアの小銃はイギリス企業、アキュラシー インターナショナルにより設計されたボルト アクション式狙撃銃シリーズの一つ。製造以来、民間や警察、軍用と幅広く人気がある。

Key.Portuguese:
Fuzil de atirador de elite
Calibre: 12.7x99 mm
Key.Japanese:
選抜射手小銃
口径: 12.7x99 mm

Key.Original: The Barrett M95 is a bolt-action sniper rifle chambered in .50 BMG (12.7 x 99 mm), and manufactured by Barrett Firearms Company. It destroy targets requiring high kinetic energy to be broken; as vehicles, command posts, radar, etc..
Key.English: The Barrett M95 is a bolt-action sniper rifle chambered in .50 BMG (12.7 x 99 mm), and manufactured by Barrett Firearms Company. It destroy targets requiring high kinetic energy to be broken; as vehicles, command posts, radar, etc..
Key.Spanish: El Barrett M95 es un fusil de francotirador de cerrojo de .50 BMG (12,7 x 99 mm), y fabricado por Barrett Firearms Company. Cumple la función de destruir objetivos que requieran gran energía cinética para ser batidos; como vehículos, puestos de mando, radares, etc.
Key.Japanese: ベレッタ M95 はベレッタ ファイヤーアームズにより製造される、.50 BMG (12.7 x 99 mm) のボルト アクション式狙撃銃である。高エネルギーにより車両や監視所、レーダーといった目標を破壊する。

Key.Original: The AW50 is a .50 BMG anti-materiel rifle designed by Accuracy International. It is a re-engineered version of the Accuracy International Arctic Warfare L96 sniper rifle.
Key.English: The AW50 is a .50 BMG anti-materiel rifle designed by Accuracy International. It is a re-engineered version of the Accuracy International Arctic Warfare L96 sniper rifle.
Key.Spanish: El AW50 es un rifle antimaterial de 0.50 diseñado por Accuracy International. Es una versión rediseñada del rifle de francotirador Accuracy International Arctic Warfare L96.
Key.Japanese: AW50 はアキュラシー インターナショナルにより製造された .50 BMG 対物狙撃銃である。アキュラシー インターナショナル アークティック ウォーフェア L96 狙撃銃を再設計したものになる。

Key.Original: The Instalaza C90 is a 90 mm disposable, shoulder-fired and one-man operated grenade launcher (RPG). It is being used as an infantry-type weapon.
Key.English: The Instalaza C90 is a 90 mm disposable, shoulder-fired and one-man operated grenade launcher (RPG). It is being used as an infantry-type weapon.
Key.Spanish: El C-90 es un lanzacohetes que dispara una granada propulsada por cohete de 90 mm fabricado por Instalaza en Zaragoza, España. Es usado como un tipo de arma para la infantería.
Key.Japanese: インスタラザ C90 は口径が 90mm で使い捨ての肩撃ち式グレネード ランチャーである。主に歩兵によって使われる。

ロケット ランチャー C100
口径: 100 mm

Key.Original: Alcotán-100 is a recoilless, one-man portable, single-use anti-tank rocket launcher used by infantry, manufactured by Instalaza.
Key.English: Alcotán-100 is a recoilless, one-man portable, single-use anti-tank rocket launcher used by infantry, manufactured by Instalaza.
Key.Spanish: El Alcotán-100, también designado como Alcotán C-100, o simplemente C-100, es un sistema lanzacohetes polivalente desarrollado y fabricado por la empresa española Instalaza.
Key.Japanese: アルコタン-100 はインスタラザによって製造される、歩兵が使う対戦車無反動砲である。
C 90 (使用済み)
C 100 (使用済み)
取る
置く
発射済み

拳銃
口径: 9x19 mm

Key.Original: The HK USP pistol 9mm parabellum German made recently entered service in the Spanish army to gradually replace the llama m82
Key.English: The HK USP pistol 9mm parabellum German made recently entered service in the Spanish army to gradually replace the llama m82
Key.Spanish: La pistola HK USP de 9mm parabelun de fabricación alemana entro recientemente en servicio en el ejército espanol para sustituir progresivamente a la llama m82
Key.Japanese: HK USP はスペイン陸軍のイラーマ M82 を置き換えるドイツ製の 9mm パラベラム拳銃である。
消音器付き HK USP
消音器付き FNP 9

散弾銃
口径: 12 mm

Key.Original: The SIG P226 is a full-sized, service-type pistol made by SIG Sauer. It is chambered for the 9×19mm Parabellum, .40 SW, .357 SIG, and .22 Long Rifle. It is essentially the same basic design of the SIG P220, but developed to use higher capacity, staggered-column magazines in place of the single-column magazines of the P220
Key.English: The SIG P226 is a full-sized, service-type pistol made by SIG Sauer. It is chambered for the 9×19mm Parabellum, .40 SW, .357 SIG, and .22 Long Rifle. It is essentially the same basic design of the SIG P220, but developed to use higher capacity, staggered-column magazines in place of the single-column magazines of the P220
Key.Spanish: La SIG-Sauer P226 es una pistola semiautomática fabricada por las empresas Schweizerische Industrie Gesellschaft de Suiza y Sauer de Alemania. Tiene versiones en calibres 9 mm Parabellum, .40 SW y .357 SIG. Su diseño está basado en la P220.
Key.Japanese: SIG P226 は SIG サウワーによって製造されるフルサイズの支給型拳銃である。口径として 9x19 mm パラベラムや .40 SW、.357 SIG、.22 ロングライフルを使用できる。SIG P220 と基本的な設計は同じだが、強装弾や並列弾倉を使用できる。

Key.Original: The MG4 is a belt-fed 5.56 mm light machine gun designed and developed by the German company Heckler and Koch.
Key.English: The MG4 is a belt-fed 5.56 mm light machine gun designed and developed by the German company Heckler and Koch.
Key.Spanish: La MG4 es una ametralladora ligera calibre 5,56 mm alimentada mediante cinta, diseñada y desarrollada por Heckler and Koch.
Key.Japanese: MG4 はヘッケラー アンド コッホによって設計、製造されたベルト式給弾型の 5.56mm 軽機関銃である。

Key.Original: The FN FNP pistol is a series of semi-automatic, polymer-framed pistols manufactured in Columbia, SC, by FNH USA, a division of Fabrique Nationale de Herstal. The pistol debuted in early 2006 and is chambered for the 9×19mm Parabellum, .40 SW, .45 ACP, and .357 SIG cartridges.
Key.English: The FN FNP pistol is a series of semi-automatic, polymer-framed pistols manufactured in Columbia, SC, by FNH USA, a division of Fabrique Nationale de Herstal. The pistol debuted in early 2006 and is chambered for the 9×19mm Parabellum, .40 SW, .45 ACP, and .357 SIG cartridges.
Key.Spanish: La pistola FN FNP 9 es la seria semi-automatica, fabricada en Colombia, SC por FNH USA, una divisón de Fabrique Nationale de Herstal. La pistola entró en servicio a principios del 2006 y está calibrada para los 9x19 Parabellum, .40 SW, .45 ACP y los cartuchos .357 SIG.
Key.Japanese: FN FNP 拳銃は、FNH USA により製造されるポリマー フレームの半自動拳銃である。2006 年初めに公開され、9×19mm パラベラムや .40 SW、.45 ACP、.357 SIG 口径を使用できる。

Key.Original: The Fabarm SDASS is a shotgun designed for police and/or security uses and has some special features such as folding front sight, built-in Picatinny rails on the top of the receiver, lengthened forearm to provide better control over the gun. SDASS shotguns are manufactured in a variety of differing styles.
Key.English: The Fabarm SDASS is a shotgun designed for police and/or security uses and has some special features such as folding front sight, built-in Picatinny rails on the top of the receiver, lengthened forearm to provide better control over the gun. SDASS shotguns are manufactured in a variety of differing styles.
Key.Spanish: La Fabarm SDASS está diseñada para el uso de la policía / seguridad y tiene algunas características especiales como la mirilla frontal plegable, una función de rieles estilo Picatinny en la parte superior del receptor, brazo alargado para proporcionar un mejor control sobre el arma. Las escopetas SDASS se fabrican en una gran variedad de estilos
Key.Japanese: ファバーム SDASS は警察やご栄養に設計されており、折りたためる照門、銃身の上部と下部へあらかじめ組み込まれたピカティニー レイル、延長された保持部分など良好な操作性のためにいくつかの特別な機能を持っている。SDASS 散弾銃はさまざま

Key.Original: The Ameli (abbreviated from the Spanish Ametralladora ligera or "light machine gun") is a 5.56mm light machine gun designed for the Spanish Army (Ejército de Tierra) by the nationally-owned and operated Centro de Estudios Técnicos de Materiales Especiales (CETME) small arms research institute (founded by the Spanish government in 1950).
Key.English: The Ameli (abbreviated from the Spanish Ametralladora ligera or "light machine gun") is a 5.56mm light machine gun designed for the Spanish Army (Ejército de Tierra) by the nationally-owned and operated Centro de Estudios Técnicos de Materiales Especiales (CETME) small arms research institute (founded by the Spanish government in 1950).
Key.Spanish: Fue diseñada para el Ejército de Tierra de España por el instituto de investigación nacional "Centro de Estudios Técnicos de Materiales Especiales", CETME, fundado por el Gobierno Español en 1950.
Key.Japanese: アメリ（スペイン語で Spanish Ametralladora ligera）は国営の Centro de Estudios Técnicos de Materiales Especiales によって、スペイン陸軍向けに設計された 5.56mm の軽機関銃である。

Key.Original: The MG-3 has a proven record of reliability, durability, simplicity, and ease of operation, but is most notable for its ability to produce a high volume of suppressive fire. The MG-3 had one of the highest average cyclic rate of any single-barreled man-portable machine gun: between 1,200 and 1,500 rpm, which results in a distinctive muzzle report.
Key.English: The MG-3 has a proven record of reliability, durability, simplicity, and ease of operation, but is most notable for its ability to produce a high volume of suppressive fire. The MG-3 had one of the highest average cyclic rate of any single-barreled man-portable machine gun: between 1,200 and 1,500 rpm, which results in a distinctive muzzle report.
Key.Spanish: La MG-3 posiblemente tenía la cadencia de tiro más alta entre las ametralladoras medias de un único cañón y un expediente probado de fiabilidad, durabilidad y simplicidad. Además de ser fácil de usar por la tropa, consiguió la reputación de ser una de las mejores ametralladoras creadas.
Key.Japanese: MG3 は信頼性や耐久性、簡易性で操作が簡単だが、最も顕著であるのは圧倒的な制圧射撃能力だ。MG3 は高い発射速度と単一銃身を持つ機関銃であり、1,200 rpm から 1,500 rpm まで可能である。

Key.Original: The MP5 is a German submachine gun famous for great reliability and excellent accuracy in its class. Often the weapon of choice for international military and law-enforcement special forces.
Key.English: The MP5 is a German submachine gun famous for great reliability and excellent accuracy in its class. Often the weapon of choice for international military and law-enforcement special forces.
Key.Spanish: La MP5 es una metralleta alemana famosa por ofrecer gran fiabilidad y una excelente precisión en su clase. Es el arma elegida por las fuerzas militares y cuerpos de seguridad internacionales.
Key.Japanese: MP5 は、ドイツの現代を代表する短機関銃であり、命中精度の高さから軍、警察の特殊部隊などでは標準的な装備となっている。

Key.Original: The UMP (Universale Maschinenpistole, German for "Universal Machine Pistol") is a submachine gun developed and manufactured by Heckler and Koch.
Key.English: The UMP (Universale Maschinenpistole, German for "Universal Machine Pistol") is a submachine gun developed and manufactured by Heckler and Koch.
Key.Spanish: El UMP (Universale Maschinepistole, "subfusil universal" en alemán) es un subfusil desarrollado y manufacturado en Alemania por Heckler and Koch.
Key.Japanese: UMP (Universale Maschinen pistole) はヘッケラー アンド コッホによって設計、製造される短機関銃である。
